name: Booze Traveler
overview: Actor/adventurer Jack Maxwell learned a lot working in South Boston bars, and one lesson stood out: Enjoy a couple of drinks with a stranger, and the whole world opens up. Those experiences inspired "Booze Traveler," which follows Maxwell to various countries to quench his curiosity about what people drink, why, and the tales it prompts. In Armenia, Belize, Lithuania, Mongolia, Nepal and elsewhere, Maxwell learns its intoxicating traditions, meets with locals, joins in activities, and even helps with the alcohol-making process. He finds a unique drink, makes friends and shares stories in each spot.

episodes.name: Turkey is Stirring
episodes.overview: Beer, rebellion, soccer, Islam and fiery brandy stir modern Turkey. Although drinking is highly restricted, Turks drink defiantly and patriotically across the country, from bustling city streets to ancient islands. Jack Maxwell finds that every glass comes with a very big twist.

episodes.name: Peru Is Magic
episodes.overview: From Machu Picchu to the fiery capital of Lima, Peru serves up strange magic at every turn. Jack is in the Land of the Inca to discover the culture behind many of Peru’s most popular drinks, including canazo, a sugarcane liquor, and masato, a traditional Peruvian beverage also known as “spit beer.”

episodes.name: Spain: Mixed, Not Blended
episodes.overview: With more bars per capita than any other European country, Spain is just one big fiesta for Jack Maxwell. From tasting sherry in Andalusia to being introduced to Queimada, a flaming punch made with orujo, a 100-proof, wine-based spirit, in Galicia, Jack takes an intoxicating tour of Spain.

episodes.name: Austria Is Good For You
episodes.overview: From soothing hops baths to Zirbenschnapps, a digestive pinecone schnapps, booze in Austria doubles as a medicinal method. Jack heads to downtown Franking to sip on one of Austria’s most famous drinks, visits a distillery in Upper Austria to taste the famous (and quite expensive) eau-de-vie, and much more.

episodes.name: Iceland's Warm Fire
episodes.overview: The land is cold, but the people are warm and full of spirit — the kind of spirit you can drink! Icelanders stay toasty by sipping on their liquor, and Jack is more than willing to join in on the party. From fjallagrassa in the mountains to sipping beer in Hafnarfjordur, he attempts to drink his way across the Land of Fire and Ice.

episodes.name: Mongolian Road Trip
episodes.overview: Jack travels to the base of the Khangai Mountains to try fermented horse milk; takes a tour of a factory where liquid is filtered through diamonds and pearls to create the perfect vodka; and gets a lesson on making camel-milk vodka.

episodes.name: Nepal: A Higher State
episodes.overview: From his hometown of Boston to the highest mountain range in the world, Jack travels high into the Himalayas to taste some of the best drinks in Nepal, including a marijuana milkshake, sherpa beer and the Yeti's favorite drink.

episodes.name: Japan Uncorked
episodes.overview: Jack takes his booze travels to Japan, a country that has a reputation for being a little unconventional. Amid a culture of honor, family and strict order, drinking provides a balance to this lifestyle and an outlet for people to relax.

episodes.name: Loopy Lithuania
episodes.overview: Lithuania proves that 50 years of oppression didn’t change the ways of the people. Jack gets an inside look at the world of paganism, its rituals and its love for mead. He also experiences the wonders of homemade Lithuanian beer. In the midst of all this, Jack finds a sport that suits him: keg tossing.

episodes.name: Netherlands: Liquid Courage
episodes.overview: Jack experiences the rich, innovative drinking history of the Netherlands. He parties on a bike bar, visits a bank filled with beer, and eats herring like the locals.

episodes.name: The Armenian Trail
episodes.overview: Human sacrifice, mulberry moonshine, wine grapes from Noah's ark and brandy that changed the world.

episodes.name: Dead in New Orleans
episodes.overview: The Day of the Dead in The Big Easy with tobacco liquor and voodoo room service.

episodes.name: Belize: Paradise Found
episodes.overview: As Jack explores the many drinks Belize has to offer, he finds that the rugged Central American paradise has attracted people from all over the world. But no matter where you come from or why you're there, Belize always welcomes you with a cocktail.

episodes.name: South Africa: Hidden Gems
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell's tour of South Africa includes a fruit that will give an elephant a buzz, homemade honey hooch, Zulu tribal beer, and wine from palm trees.

episodes.name: Tennessee: Red, White and Booze
episodes.overview: A link between moonshiners and George Washington; a legendary whiskey brought back from the dead.

episodes.name: Greece: The Morning After
episodes.overview: smashing bachelor party, sheep and what's supposed to be an ancient hangover cure.

episodes.name: Sicily: A Family Thing
episodes.overview: A secret drink with a long-lost Queen; race cars; mafia-fighting bar owners.

episodes.name: Finland: Sisu, Sauna & the Midnight Sun
episodes.overview: Vodka with Santa's helper; a truck full of naked men; a fruity sudden death.

episodes.name: Hungary: Aliens, Soviets & Gypsies
episodes.overview: A brandy-soaked wake up call; cat dancing; a life-or-death secret recipe.

episodes.name: Tanzania: Increase Happy
episodes.overview: Banana beer on Kilimanjaro; Maasai boot camp; a drink that grows on trees.

episodes.name: Scotland: Monsters, Men and the Mac
episodes.overview: St Andrew's 19th hole; part-time Vikings; the world's most expensive scotch.

episodes.name: Hawaiian Crush
episodes.overview: Daiquiris in a Jurassic park; courage on the bunny slope; pineapple homebrew.

episodes.name: Texas Is Full Of It
episodes.overview: Drive-thru margaritas, honky-tonk bingo, bloody beers and the pass of death.

episodes.name: Philippines
episodes.overview: Coconut lighting, hoop daydreams, gin and juice and a military-spec food fight.

episodes.name: New Zealand
episodes.overview: The Green Dragon, stag semen stout and rustling up some grubs.

episodes.name: Argentina
episodes.overview: Cuddling with horses, the brew of the gods and the left-footed tango.

episodes.name: Savannah
episodes.overview: Bourbon-soaked chocolate, gator toss, weapons grade punch and skeletons on the porch.

episodes.name: Guatemala
episodes.overview: Mayan tailgating; a field trip to the underworld; a drink with a god.

episodes.name: Hong Kong
episodes.overview: Dueling dragons; cobra wine; drunken Kung Fu; beers fit for kings.

episodes.name: Brazil
episodes.overview: A rolling party, bikers, superfood cocktails, samba superstar, sun, and sand.

episodes.name: India
episodes.overview: Jack experiences Maharaja moonshine and a Bollywood cast party in India.

episodes.name: Drinking games
episodes.overview: Jack competes in his favorite booze-fueled contests from around the world. It's not all fun and games, as Jack challenges sumo wrestlers, Nepalese warriors & Tanzanian

episodes.name: Hair of the Dog
episodes.overview: Jack competes in his favorite booze-fueled contests from around the world. It's not all fun and games, as Jack challenges sumo wrestlers, Nepalese warriors & Tanzanian tribesmen in crazy, bizarre global traditions.

episodes.name: Shaken and Stirred
episodes.overview: World traveler and booze expert Jack Maxwell enjoys his travels as he does his drinks: shaken and stirred. This special highlights Jack's most bizarre and craziest adventures while discovering the world's best drinks.

episodes.name: Spirits of Ol' Mexico
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell learns the meaning of Mexican immortality when he gets blindfolded and thrown into the back of a truck to taste some award-winning mezcal, works the agave fields for tequila, almost gets burned alive in an ancient Aztec ceremony and has a first date with the Saint of Death.

episodes.name: The Magic of Ireland
episodes.overview: From Irish coffee and boozy ice cream to road bowling and pints at the pub, Jack Maxwell meets the people and hears their stories to find out how little Ireland left such a huge mark on the world.

episodes.name: On the Rocks
episodes.overview: The hunt for a mysterious cocktail in Siberia made from Russia's national spirit, cooled by special ice, comes from a holy place and is blessed by a shaman.

episodes.name: Florida's Free Spirits
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell lets his freak flag fly in the Sunshine State, Florida. He joins a wacky rebellion, drinks whiskey out of a dead alligator, dabbles in Haitian Voodoo, sails a floating Tiki Bar and finds his favorite Miami vice.

episodes.name: A G'Day Down Under
episodes.overview: In this former penal colony, Jack Maxwell has a mussel-diving, sheep-shearing, brothel-crashing, vegemite-swallowing good time in Australia. With the best drinking buddies in the world, it's no worries mate!

episodes.name: South Korea: Mind Your Manners
episodes.overview: In South Korea, Jack has a lot to learn when it comes to drink etiquette - all while eating live octopus, taking a punch at an ancient fortress and seeing North Korea, the most isolated country in the modern world.

episodes.name: Twain's Mighty Mississippi
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell follows Mark Twain's path up the Mississippi river, hitting Louisiana's Mardi Gras, Minnesota's Beer Dabbler Festival and drinking a cocktail in Missouri created by Twain himself.

episodes.name: Arak-ing Trip Through Israel
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell heads to Israel, the Land of Milk and Honey. He takes a dip in the Dead Sea, drinks Arak, enjoys a beer with the Speed Sisters and runs into some rowdy rabbis before ending his trip with pomegranate and almond wines at a Shavuot festival.

episodes.name: Drink in the Zen
episodes.overview: After a long, dark past, Cambodia is on the rise. Jack Maxwell drinks Special Muscle Wine with his new friend Chun and hunts spiders for a drink with bite. He visits the holy site Angkor Wat and floats to a village to make some fish paste.

episodes.name: Colombia: Wayuu Wahoo and The Golden One
episodes.overview: Intoxicated by Colombia, Jack Maxwell visits a Wayuu village where women rule, uncovers El Dorado's smoky truth, breathes in the rum culture and detoxes in a devil's volcano.

episodes.name: Legendary Croatia
episodes.overview: Jack discovers the most epic booze-soaked tales of Croatian legend. He drinks wine with monsters, sieges a centuries old castle, drinks truffles in the land of giants, curses like a sailor in a traditional balote game and finds the cave of Odysseus.

episodes.name: Cuba: Kings of Cocktail
episodes.overview: After more than 50 years of being cut off from America, Jack Maxwell visits Cuba! He gets cleansed in the country's oldest religion, drinks rum, sees Hemingway's beloved Havana and sips on the national drink, an iced mojito.

episodes.name: Playing the Booze in Portugal
episodes.overview: In his quest to understand why the Portuguese can feel so homesick, Jack Maxwell dives for a rare seafood delicacy, visits Dr. Frankenstein's liquor laboratory, unearths the Wine of Death and tastes the crown jewel of Portuguese booze, Port wine.

episodes.name: The Force of Madagascar
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell taps into the mysterious energies of Madagascar and drinks its most potent spirits. He meets mystical monkeys, concocts a snake blood cocktail, shakes his booty with a local tribe, eats pig face for breakfast and makes a boozy offering to the spirit of a king.

episodes.name: Siberia: Ice-olated Spirit
episodes.overview: A bundled-up Jack drills holes in Siberia's icy Lake Baikal and sips vodka from a straw on the surface. Then, he takes a shot from a Cossack's sword, sips deer blood and tries Polugar bread wine, the national drink of Russia.

episodes.name: German Precision Und Schnapps
episodes.overview: Jack Maxwell drinks with the Germans who engineer the world's finest brew and booze. He tries his hand at playing an Alphorn, watches a traditional Bavarian whipcracking contest, sips on anti-aging beer and is introduced to a giant robot dragon.

episodes.name: Last Call of the Wild West
episodes.overview: From shootouts at high noon and drinks with Nevada's wildest secret society to Sin City showgirls and a booze cruise on Lake Tahoe, Jack Maxwell meets the people keeping the West wild.

episodes.name: Planes, Trains and a Chicken Bus
episodes.overview: Jack looks back on the crazy adventures he's had in pursuit of a drink. Dragon Boat racing for beers in Hong Kong, rompopo on a chicken bus in Guatemala, roadside hooch in Armenia and snowshoeing for mulled wine in the Andes.

episodes.name: Tahitian Dream
episodes.overview: Maxwell immerses himself in the culture of Tahiti; he has an authentic tamure dream, a drink named for a traditional dance; he tastes brut d'ananas, a pineapple champagne, and pia uru, a local beer brewed from breadfruit.

episodes.name: Viking In A Bottle
episodes.overview: Jack searches fjords for old Viking magic in a bottle; he clinks glasses with Vikings, discovers powerful and ancient ingredients and learns the booziest myths left behind by the fearsome people of the Frozen North.

episodes.name: The Roarin' Rockies
episodes.overview: Jack wants to see how the rugged Rocky Mountains became a world-class playground. He learns the ways of the mountain men, experiences the wildest winter festival, and finds his favorite drinking game.

episodes.name: Costa Rica's Pure Life
episodes.overview: Jack wants to learn the true meaning of "Pura Vida": the Costa Rican secret to true happiness. To find his happy place, he dodges a stampede of bulls, comes face-to-face with a deadly snake, and drinks an ancient beer made from mold.

episodes.name: The Common Crown
episodes.overview: Jack meets the everyday men and women who've held up the crown. He travels back in time to the English Civil War; sings a shanty song in the Caribbean of the UK; goes toe-to-toe with a toe wrestler; and drinks with Robin Hood in the oldest pub.

episodes.name: Asia's Hidden Gem
episodes.overview: Jack drinks in Taiwan, the greatest hidden gem of East Asia. He drinks with the Taiwanese ghostbusters; experiences a dazzling natural light show deep below the earth; and finds his Zen at a private spa with a drunken monk.

episodes.name: Caribbean Rhythm
episodes.overview: Jack discovers the true wonders of the Caribbean Islands. Featured: drinking liquid dynamite at a hidden jungle bar; throwing back wild bush rum concoctions; and scraping away poison to purify beer.

episodes.name: Home is Where the Booze Is
episodes.overview: Jack heads back to his native soil for a boozy homecoming in New England. He gets to live one of his greatest childhood dreams at Fenway Park, sinks a British ship, drinks a bizarre beaver-spiked liquor and learns what it takes to be a lobsterman.

episodes.name: L'Arte de Booze
episodes.overview: Jack experiences the art of living in France, one drink at a time. He explores the beautiful and brutal world of water jousting, drinks boozy foam in the French Alps with a couple hundred goats and toasts the finest champagne on Bastille Day.

episodes.name: Italy: It's Personal
episodes.overview: Jack finds out rivalries run deep in Italy; he consults a bronze pig for good luck, picks walnuts with a local witch, lifts a curse with brandy, and finds a spot in the world's smallest bar.

episodes.name: Czech Castles and Cocktails
episodes.overview: Jack finds the Czech Republic's most magical elixirs and beers; he stumbles upon one of the oldest clocks in the world, drinks booze in a gingerbread shop that would make Hansel and Gretel blush and delves as deep as a dwarf in the Punkva caves.

episodes.name: Boozy Beginnings Of The Chesapeake Bay
episodes.overview: The Chesapeake Bay is the land of great beginnings and Jack Maxwell is tracing its origins one drink at a time. He makes crude colonial cocktails, races blue crabs, hunts and traps eels and muskrats then finds the origins of America's first whiskey -- because sometimes you have to go to the beginning to see how the Chesapeake's boozy story ends.

episodes.name: Southwest Spirits
episodes.overview: Drinks of the American Southwest; one of the largest hot air balloon parties in the world; drinking with rodeo clowns; mind-blowing art instillation; hottest peppers.

episodes.name: The End Begins in Chile
episodes.overview: From a cocktail cooled with glacier ice to an ancient drink with Chile's first people, Jack discovers how the locals live, play and drink in a land at the end of the world.

episodes.name: Michigan's Endless Summer
episodes.overview: Jack heads to the Great Lakes to relive his favorite childhood summer adventures. He motors through the Silver Lake sand dunes, meets world champion lumberjacks, makes fudge on Mackinac Island and finds a boozy summer camp.
